sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>public</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>global.ImpersonateEvaluator</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <description>Allows special rules to be applied to impersonations, gives access to the current user and the user they wish to impersonate.</description> <name>ImpersonateEvaluator</name> <script><![CDATA[var ImpersonateEvaluator = Class.create(); ImpersonateEvaluator.prototype = { initialize: function() {}, type: 'ImpersonateEvaluator', canImpersonate: function(currentUser, impersonatedUser) { return true; } };]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2015-10-01 21:30:06</sys_created_on> <sys_id>7d8bd212673202006c45322b43415a18</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>11</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>ImpersonateEvaluator</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Concourse Navpage" source="com.glide.ui.concourse">e89d3cc76d2220100acb70b35343301a</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_7d8bd212673202006c45322b43415a18</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2015-10-02 19:46:21</sys_updated_on> <u_script_length>219</u_script_length> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
